name: Nonograms: Falcross
description:
Zen out & relax with puzzles that love you back*! Decode the numbers to uncover hidden pictures in this fun and challenging brain teaser.

"I love the colors and the challenge of Falcross. Engaging and fun." - Youhaveatypo (user review)
"Played lots of ‘pixel’ games and this one is FABULOUS" - Glyn Meek (user review)
"These puzzles are wonderful, but maybe you should consider getting a real job” - My mom

THOUSANDS OF AMAZING PUZZLES
Stick it to your eye doctor with puzzles so good you can't look away! Grab your hydrating eyedrops and get ready to discover monsters, landscapes, abstract masterpieces and more with over 25 themed puzzle packs and a massive online community of creators.

CREATE, SHARE & BUILD A FOLLOWING
An intuitive puzzle editor makes it super easy for anyone to create their own puzzles and publish them to the world! Share your awesome creations to attract followers who dig your style.

EASY CONTROLS
Zoom in! Use the cursor! No matter what size screen you're playing on, Falcross provides comfortable controls that get out of the way so that you can focus on solving puzzles.

PALATABLE MARKETING
Our marketing guy thought we should use this copy: "FALCROSS: PUZZLES SO HOT YOU'LL FAINT! ARE YOU READY TO PASS OUT?" So we fired him.

SUPPORT INDIE DEVELOPERS
This game was made by one person. You'll be doing your part in taking on the big guys and feeding a hungry developer.

97% of Falcross players report a hearty smile after solving just one puzzle**--will you join them?

* Just as a friend, though.
** 43% of all statistics are made up.
